===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|苦|sc=Jpan|tr=ku||hard, energetically}} + {{m|ja|心|sc=Jpan|tr=shin||heart}}

===Noun===

====Derived terms====

* [[苦心惨憺]] (''kushin santan''): taking great pains

====Idioms====
* [[苦心を買われる]] (''kushin o kawareru''): have one's labor appreciated
